name: parasoft-findings-vsts
description: Parasoft Findings enables you to visualize test and static analysis results generated by Parasoft products in Azure DevOps

scripts.clean: del-cli coverage .nyc_output target test-reports && npx tsc --build --clean
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && nyc jasmine
scripts.compile: npx tsc --build --clean && npx tsc && cd ./PublishParasoftResults && npm run compilexsl && cd ..
scripts.create-extension: npm test && npm run downloadReportGenerator && npx tfx-cli extension create

author: Parasoft Corporation
